sentence.Network_en: Lack of money has proved an almost insurmountable obstacle.
sentence.Network_cn: 资金不足已成为一个几乎无法逾越的障碍.

sentence.Network_en: No difficulty is insurmountable if one sets one's mind on it.

sentence.Network_cn: 年龄障碍看来是无法逾越的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...snap 猛地咬住 (使某物)发出尖厉声音地突然断裂[打开, 关闭] 厉声地说insurmountable 不能克服的,不能超越的confuse 使困惑, 把…弄糊涂混淆, 把…混同.
insurer 保险人insurmountable 难克服的INT COMP 内部构件
insurance 保险insurmountable 不可克服的intake 收纳
不可逾越 insuperable不可逾越 insurmountable不可避免 ineluctability

list.abs: but this kind of proposition sinks into a predicament because of the shortage of powerful theoretical supporting , and also comes across insurmountable barrier in practice .这一主张在理论上因缺乏强有力的支撑而陷入困境，在实践上也遇到重大障碍。
Sometimes a seemingly insurmountable obstacle blocks the way to our goal., 有时候 , 在我们通往终点的路上有一些似乎不可逾越的障碍阻挡我们.
on the mileage of Chinese pioneer's literature , its height achieved by the text makes people insurmountable .在中国先锋文学的裹程表上，其文本所成就的高度令人瞩目。
non-alignment 不结盟insurmountable difficulty 不可克服的困难inequality 不平等

entry.tran: 无法解决的;难以克服的;不可逾越的
entry.def: A problem that is insurmountable is so great that it cannot be dealt with successfully.

example.ex: The crisis doesn't seem like an insurmountable problem.
example.tran: 这次危机似乎并不难以克服。

means.word_mean: 1. not capable of being surmounted or overcome;

auth_sentence.content: But we do not see any insurmountable challenges.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we do not see any insurmountable challenges.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we do not see any insurmountable challenges.

auth_sentence.content: This is certainly true, but they are not insurmountable.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is certainly true, but they are not insurmountable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is certainly true, but they are not insurmountable.

auth_sentence.content: For many would-be entrepreneurs, money is the insurmountable hurdle.
auth_sentence.res_content: For many would-be entrepreneurs, money is the insurmountable hurdle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For many would-be entrepreneurs, money is the insurmountable hurdle.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能克服的,难以对付的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+surmount克服+able可以……的→不能克服的
para类似+mount登上,山,安装→类似高山→最高的
mounte=mount登上+bank=bench→登上长椅[卖假药]→江湖骗子
dis去,下+mount登上,山,安装→从[马上]下来
re重新+mount登上,山,安装→再次登上

sentences.en: There is no insurmountable difficulty before a brave man;it is in difficult circumstances that a hero distinguishes himself.
sentences.cn: 好汉面前无困难,困难当中出英雄。

sentences.en: Lack of money has proved an almost insurmountable obstacle.
sentences.cn: 资金不足已成为一个几乎无法逾越的障碍。
年龄障碍看来是无法逾越的。

sentences.en: Force Majeure means all events which are beyond the control of the Parties, and which are unforeseen, unavoidable or insurmountable, and which prevent total or partial performance by either of the Parties or by the Company.
sentences.cn: 不可抗力指双方无法控制、且不能预见、不能避免或不能克服的所有事件，该等事件阻止任何一方或公司全部或部分履行本合同。
